• Encrypted email that's private by default.

    • vaults A vault in Proton Pass is an encrypted digital container that contains your items. An item can be a login, an alias, a secured note.
    • hide-my-email aliases

    Secure your passwords and identity

    View Pass plans

    • total storage Storage space is shared across Proton Mail, Proton Calendar, and Proton Drive.
    • email addresses
    • Unlimited messages
    • Support for custom email domains
    • Unlimited folders, labels and filters
    • Unlimited hide-my-email aliases Get unlimited aliases with SimpleLogin by Proton.

    Access blocked content and browse privately

    • vaults A vault in Proton Pass is an encrypted digital container that contains your items. An item can be a login, an alias, a secured note.
    • Unlimited hide-my-email aliases
